meta.description: Determine the production schedule for Sailco Corporation to minimize the sum of production and inventory costs over four quarters.

sets.name: QUARTERS
sets.description: The four quarters of the year.

params.name: demand
params.description: Demand for sailboats in each quarter.

params.name: initial_inventory
params.description: Initial inventory of sailboats at the beginning of the first quarter.

params.name: regular_cost
params.description: Cost per sailboat produced with regular-time labor.

params.name: overtime_cost
params.description: Cost per sailboat produced with overtime labor.

params.name: holding_cost
params.description: Holding cost per sailboat at the end of each quarter.

params.name: regular_capacity
params.description: Maximum number of sailboats that can be produced with regular-time labor per quarter.

vars.name: regular_production
vars.description: Number of sailboats produced with regular-time labor in each quarter.

vars.name: overtime_production
vars.description: Number of sailboats produced with overtime labor in each quarter.

vars.name: inventory
vars.description: Inventory of sailboats at the end of each quarter.

objective.name: min_total_cost
objective.expr: sum(regular_production[q] * regular_cost + overtime_production[q] * overtime_cost + inventory[q] * holding_cost for q in ['1', '2', '3', '4'])
objective.description: Minimize the total cost of production and inventory over four quarters.

constraints.name: inventory_balance_q1
constraints.description: Inventory balance for the first quarter.

constraints.name: inventory_balance_q2
constraints.description: Inventory balance for the second quarter.

constraints.name: inventory_balance_q3
constraints.description: Inventory balance for the third quarter.

constraints.name: inventory_balance_q4
constraints.description: Inventory balance for the fourth quarter.
